I can guide you through the features offered by the website, vaccination slot booking, searching available centres, downloading vaccine certificate, verifying cerificate

Using the CoWIN website you can 
1)Book your vaccination slot
2)Search availability at a vaccination centre
3)Download your vaccination certificate
4)Verify your cerificate
What do you need help with?

patterns: How to book a vaccination slot?
I want to book a slot
Steps to book a vaccination slot
responses:
Steps to book your vaccination slot: 
1)Click on book your slot option
2)Enter Mobile Number to register/sign in and then click on Get OTP
3)Enter 6 digit OTP and click, verify and proceed
4) For first time users, you need to enter details of ID proof. For existing users, click on book my slot and follow the instructions

patterns: I think my certificate is fake
responses: To verify your vaccination certificate, click on Verify Cerificate option in the top blue menu or on the homepage and follow the listed steps

patterns: I want to search for a vaccination centre
Where can I get my vaccine shot
responses: You can Check Your Nearest Vaccination Center And Slots Availability and search based on pin code, district or map

patterns: Is online registration mandatory for Covid 19 vaccination?
Is it compulsory to register online?
responses:
Vaccination Centres provide for a limited number of on-spot registration slots every day. Beneficiaries aged 45 years and above can schedule appointments online or walk-in to vaccination centres. Beneficiaries aged 18 years and above can schedule appointments online or walk-in to Government vaccination centres. However, beneficiaries aged 18-44 years should mandatorily register themselves and schedule appointment online before going to a Private vaccination centre.
In general, all beneficiaries are recommended to register online and schedule vaccination in advance for a hassle-free vaccination experience.

patterns: How many people can be registered in the CoWIN portal through one mobile number?
How can I register my family members?
responses: Up to 4 people can be registered for vaccination using the same mobile number
You can register upto 4 people or family members using one mobile number

patterns: Can I register for vaccination without Aadhaar card?
I don't have Adhaar card to register
responses:
You can register on CoWIN portal using any of the following ID proofs:
a. Aadhaar card
b. Driving License
c. PAN card
d. Passport
e. Pension Passbook
f. NPR Smart Card
g. Voter ID (EPIC)
h. Unique Disability ID (UDID)
i. Ration Card

patterns: Is there any registration charges to be paid?
responses: Registration is completely free of cost
No registration fees to be paid whatsoever

patterns: Can I check the vaccine being administered at each vaccination centre?
responses: While scheduling an appointment for vaccination, the system will show vaccination centre names along with the name of the vaccine that will be administered

patterns: I missed my slot? How to rebook?
responses: The appointment can be rescheduled at any time. In case you are not able to go for vaccination on the date of appointment, you can reschedule the appointment by clicking on 'Manage Appointment' option under Vaccination Services tab.

patterns: Where will I receive confirmation of date and time of vaccination?
I booked my vaccine. How to know date and time?
responses: Once an appointment is scheduled, you will receive the details of the vaccination centre, date and time slot chosen for appointment in an SMS sent to your registered mobile number. You can also download the appointment slip and print it or keep it on your smart phone.

patterns: No appointments are available in this period
When I click on vaccination centre it shows 'No appointments are available in this period'. What to do?
responses: In case of no availability of slots for scheduling appointment for vaccination in the searched vaccination centre, you may try scheduling appointment in other nearby centres. The portal gives you the feature of searching vaccination centres using your PIN code and District.

patterns: Where can I download my certificate?
responses: Upon succesful vaccination, you can download your certificate from the CoWIN website. On the homepage, under Vaccination Services Menu, choose download certificate option. Sign in and click on download certificate button to get your certificate in pdf form

patterns: How many people have taken the vaccine?
responses: Checkout the CoWIN dashboard for all statistics related to covid vaccination.

patterns: How to change the language on the website?
responses: You can easily change the language of the page. To change, click on English on the top blue menu and choose your preferred language
